qaApiDemos.request:
<IATA_EMD_NeutralRefundRQ Version="08.1" TicketDocQuantity="1">
    <Header>
        <ServiceName>TICKETREFUND</ServiceName>
        <AirLine>COMMON</AirLine>
    </Header>
    <POS>
        <Source PseudoCityCode="BJS247" ISOCountry="CN" ISOCurrency="CNY" TerminalID="fd0173">
            <RequestorID Type="T" ID="08300014" ID_Context="BJS"/>
            <BookingChannel Type="GDS">
                <CompanyName Code="1E"/>
            </BookingChannel>
        </Source>
    </POS>
    <TicketDocument Type="Y" TicketDocumentNbr="6073051626145">
        <CouponInfo Number="1"/>
    </TicketDocument>
    <PaymentDetail PaymentType="CA">
        <PaymentAmount Amount="115" CurrencyCode="CNY" DecimalPlaces="0" RefundCalcMethod="Manual"/>
    </PaymentDetail>
</IATA_EMD_NeutralRefundRQ>
